com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform

Interface IPeerSelector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClassifiedPeerSelector, NHopPeerSelector, PeerInstanceSelector, TopologicalPeerSelector

    public interface IPeerSelector
    Provides a way to specify a sub-set of application peers within the application's name space. This may include selection based on topology information, app ids, etc.
    Author:
    dawood

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<IApplicationDescriptor> getPeers(IApplicationDescriptor app, ITopologyMonitor topoMonitor)
      Get the requested applications according to the implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • getPeers

        java.util.Collection<IApplicationDescriptor> getPeers(IApplicationDescriptor app,
                                                    ITopologyMonitor topoMonitor)
        Get the requested applications according to the implementation.
        Parameters:
        app - the application for which the peers are being sought.
        topoMonitor - provides information about topology of peers.
        Returns:
        never null. All returned IApplicationDescriptors must be peers of the one given, and the given app must not be contained in the returned collection.
